channel.title: Java PROBLEMS
channel.description: Ok when i open my runserver file it jsut closes quickly and when i open compile it says i do not have java installed when i do have java installed can anyone help me D= I have java 6 update 10 and Classpath- CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%; Path-C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin; Ok could someone with java 6 update 10 tell me what their ClassPath and Path are set as, Thank you for your time and help, Jarod

item.title: Java PROBLEMS

item.description:

try putting pause on a new line at the end of the runserver code.

item.title: Java PROBLEMS
item.dc:creator: @jarodh jarodh
item.description:
@jarodh wrote:

Ok when i open my runserver file it jsut closes quickly and when i open compile it says i do not have java installed when i do have java installed can anyone help me D=
I have java 6 update 10 and
Classpath- CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Path-C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;
Ok could someone with java 6 update 10 tell me what their ClassPath and Path are set as,
Thank you for your time and help,
Jarod
